UpdateLog.description:
[title]Recent News[/title][font]Small[/font]
[title]Bug Fixes[/title][font]Small[/font] - Fixed bug where AssignDefaults xml attribute would attempt to add a duplicate custom cost.
- Fixed damage / deflection / penetration calculation which is supposed to immitate vanilla RNG damage mechanics. [title]Additional Changes[/title][font]Small[/font] - Removed "Click for More Info tooltip on vehicle components health menu until further notice. I need to actually add an additional window for more details.
- Removed generic armor value and implemented armor ratings on a per part basis. [title]Final Notes[/title][font]Small[/font] Please report any issues you find [link]https://github.com/SmashPhil/Vehicles/issues[/link](here.) or on the discord server.
